title: Evaluating Roadside Perception for Autonomous Vehicles: Insights from Field Testing. (arXiv:2401.12392v1 [cs.RO])
abstract: Roadside perception systems are increasingly crucial in enhancing traffic safety and facilitating cooperative driving for autonomous vehicles. Despite rapid technological advancements, a major challenge persists for this newly arising field: the absence of standardized evaluation methods and benchmarks for these systems. This limitation hampers the ability to effectively assess and compare the performance of different systems, thus constraining progress in this vital field. This paper introduces a comprehensive evaluation methodology specifically designed to assess the performance of roadside perception systems. Our methodology encompasses measurement techniques, metric selection, and experimental trial design, all grounded in real-world field testing to ensure the practical applicability of our approach. translated_title: 自动驾驶车辆路边感知的评估：来自现场测试的见解
translated_abstract: 路边感知系统在提高交通安全和促进自动驾驶车辆的合作驾驶方面变得越来越重要。尽管技术不断进步，但这个新兴领域仍存在一个主要挑战：缺乏标准化的评估方法和基准来评估这些系统。这种限制阻碍了有效评估和比较不同系统的性能，从而限制了这个重要领域的进展。本文介绍了一种专门设计用于评估路边感知系统性能的综合评估方法。我们的方法包括测量技术、指标选择和实验试验设计，所有这些都建立在现实世界的实地测试基础上，以确保我们方法的实际适用性。我们在控制测试环境Mcity中应用了我们的方法，评估了各种现成的感知系统。
tldr: 本文介绍了一种专门设计用于评估路边感知系统性能的综合评估方法，该方法通过现实世界的实地测试来确保实际适用性，并在控制测试环境中评估了各种现成的感知系统。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces a comprehensive evaluation methodology specifically designed to assess the performance of roadside perception systems. The methodology is grounded in real-world field testing to ensure practical applicability, and was applied to evaluate various off-the-shelf perception systems in a controlled testing environment.
